recommendation.0: carboxylic_acid (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), DIPEA (3.0 eq.), T3P  (1.8 eq.), EtOAc (7 mL/mmol), 25 up to 60 °C
recommendation.1: carboxylic_acid (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), DIPEA (2.0 eq.), COMU® (1.5 eq.), EtOAc (5 mL/mmol), 26 up to 60°C
recommendation.2: carboxylic_acid (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), Pyridine (2.0 eq.), EDC.HCl (1.3 eq.), Water (PS-750-M 3%)  (2 mL/mmol), 60°C
recommendation.3: carboxylic_acid (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), NMI (3.0 eq.), TCFH (2.0 eq.), CH3CN or EtOAc  (5 mL/mmol), 25°C
recommendation.4: Acid chloride (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), Pyridine  (20 mL/mmol), 26 up to 60°C
recommendation.5: Acid chloride (1 eq.), amine (1.1 eq.), KI (0.1 eq.), CH3CN  (3.4 mL/mmol)

Comments.3: hindered carboxylic acids with non-nucleophilic amines
